definition: Serie A, the top division of the Italian football league system
Italy/Italian/abbr. for 意大利[Yi4 da4 li4]

first of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/(used for an unspecified person or thing)/first (in a list, as a party to a contract etc)/letter "A" or roman "I" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/armor plating/shell or carapace/(of the fingers or toes) nail/bladed leather or metal armor (old)/ranking system used in the Imperial examinations (old)/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)/ancient Chinese compass point: 75°

sentences.english: Cumulatively, the Premier League has the highest debt, followed by the Spanish Primera and then the Serie A.
sentences.chinese: 日积月累，英超有着最高的负债，然后是西甲和意甲。

sentences.english: Racing Santander midfielder Aldo Duscher is attracting Serie A interest.
sentences.chinese: 桑坦德竞技的中场球员杜舍尔引起了意甲球队的兴趣。

sentences.english: "I grew up watching Serie A on TV, " he said.
sentences.chinese: “我是在电视上看着意甲长大的，”他说。

sentences.english: Finally, Diego reflected personally on his first year in Serie A.
sentences.chinese: 最后，迭戈将目光转到他自己的第一个意甲赛季。

sentences.english: Lazio play against Sampdoria this weekend in the second round of Serie A games.
sentences.chinese: 拉齐奥将在本周末的意甲第二轮与桑普多利亚交锋。

sentences.english: The former Premiership star will therefore miss Wednesday's match at Serie A strugglers Lecce.
sentences.chinese: 这位前英超球星将缺席本周三客场对莱切的意甲联赛。

sentences.english: The abolition of seedings is one of the new criteria decided by the Lega Calcio.
sentences.chinese: 这回意甲联赛委员会废除了种子球队的制度。

sentences.english: As for the future, Veron was typically ambiguous about any possible return to Serie A.
sentences.chinese: 关于未来重返意甲的可能，贝隆的回答十分含糊。

sentences.english: It was football that everyone knew, perhaps the most beautiful in Europe.
sentences.chinese: 众所周知，意甲可能是欧洲踢得最漂亮的足球联赛。

sentences.english: This time there will be no point deductions to ruin the championship.
sentences.chinese: 这一次将不会有任何罚分去摧毁意甲联赛。

sentences.english: Our youth sector has sent more players to Serie A than anyone.
sentences.chinese: 米兰青训营是向意甲输出球员最多的。

sentences.english: I wish to repeat, Arda Turan will be playing in Italy this coming season.
sentences.chinese: 我很愿意透露，在接下来的赛季图兰将去意甲踢球。

sentences.english: The potency of Serie A could take a while to be restored fully.
sentences.chinese: 意甲联赛的力量完全恢复还要过一段时间。

definition: FC Internazionale Milano (football club)/abbr. for 國際米蘭足球俱樂部|国际米兰足球俱乐部[Guo2 ji4 Mi3 lan2 Zu2 qiu2 Ju4 le4 bu4]
Napoli, capital of Campania region of Italy/Naples
La Liga, the top division of the Spanish football league system
Dortmund, city in the Ruhr 魯爾區|鲁尔区[Lu3 er3 Qu1], Germany
